reviewText: Very interesting film with a great cast.

Remember seeing A Sensitive Passionate Man on the movie of the week on tv and always wished I could find a copy of it. So I jumped when I saw this but was very disappointed because the transfer copy was awful. Had to return it.
I love David Janssen anyway but this movie was great. It is too bad he died at such a young age. He and Angie Dickenson made a great couple in the movie.

This was a very moving story, and I couldn't help thinking how much it paralleled David Janssen's own final years. It was rather painful to watch, but it also showed how such self-destructive behavior may be beyond the ability of people help those they love.
